verses.verse: In the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H1112>Belshazzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> a <S%H2377>vision<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to me, <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> <S%H310>subsequent<s%> to the one which <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to me <S%H8462>previously.<s%>

And I <S%H7200>looked<s%> in the <S%H2377>vision,<s%> and it <S%H1961>came<s%> about while I was <S%H7200>looking,<s%> that I was in the <S%H1002>citadel<s%> of <S%H7800>Susa,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H4082>province<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam;<s%> and I <S%H7200>looked<s%> in the <S%H2377>vision,<s%> and I <S%H589>myself<s%> was <S%H5921>beside<s%> the <S%H195>Ulai<s%> <S%H180>Canal.<s%>

Then I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> my <S%H5869>gaze<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H352>ram<s%> which had two <S%H7161>horns<s%> was <S%H5975>standing<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H180>canal.<s%> Now the two <S%H7161>horns<s%> [were] <S%H1364>long,<s%> but <S%H259>one<s%> [was] <S%H1364>longer<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H8145>other,<s%> with the <S%H1364>longer<s%> <S%H1364>one<s%> <S%H5927>coming<s%> up <S%H314>last.<s%>

I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H5055>butting<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%> <S%H6828>northward,<s%> and <S%H5045>southward,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> [other] <S%H9130>beasts<s%> could <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, <S%H369>nor<s%> was <S%H369>there<s%> anyone to <S%H5337>rescue<s%> from his <S%H3027>power;<s%> but he <S%H6213>did<s%> as he <S%H7522>pleased<s%> and <S%H1431>magnified<s%> [himself.]

While I was <S%H995>observing,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H6842>male<s%> <S%H6842>goat<s%> was <S%H935>coming<s%> from the <S%H4628>west<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H5060>touching<s%> the <S%H776>ground;<s%> and the <S%H6842>goat<s%> [had] a <S%H2380>conspicuous<s%> <S%H7161>horn<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And he <S%H935>came<s%> up to the <S%H352>ram<s%> that had the two <S%H7161>horns,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I had <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H180>canal,<s%> and <S%H7323>rushed<s%> at him in his <S%H3581>mighty<s%> <S%H2534>wrath.<s%>

And I <S%H7200>saw<s%> him <S%H5060>come<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and he was <S%H4843>enraged<s%> at him; and he <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> and <S%H7665>shattered<s%> his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7161>horns,<s%> and the <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> to <S%H5975>withstand<s%> him. So he <S%H7993>hurled<s%> him to the <S%H776>ground<s%> and <S%H7429>trampled<s%> on him, and there was <S%H3808>none<s%> to <S%H5337>rescue<s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> from his <S%H3027>power.<s%>

Then the <S%H6842>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> <S%H1431>magnified<s%> [himself] <S%H5704>exceedingly.<s%> <S%H3966><s%> But as soon as he was <S%H6105>mighty,<s%> the <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H7161>horn<s%> was <S%H7665>broken;<s%> and in its <S%H8478>place<s%> there <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2380>conspicuous<s%> [horns] toward the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>

And out of <S%H259>one<s%> of them <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> a rather <S%H6810>small<s%> <S%H7161>horn<s%> which <S%H1431>grew<s%> <S%H3499>exceedingly<s%> <S%H1431>great<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H5045>south,<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H4217>east,<s%> and <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H9469>Beautiful<s%> [Land.]

And it <S%H1431>grew<s%> up to the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and caused <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> and <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H3556>stars<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and it <S%H7429>trampled<s%> them <S%H7429>down.<s%>

It <S%H5704>even<s%> <S%H1431>magnified<s%> [itself] to be <S%H5704>equal<s%> with the <S%H8269>Commander<s%> of the <S%H6635>host;<s%> and it <S%H7311>removed<s%> the <S%H8548>regular<s%> <S%H8548>sacrifice<s%> from Him, and the <S%H4349>place<s%> of His <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> was <S%H7993>thrown<s%> <S%H7993>down.<s%>

And on account of <S%H6588>transgression<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> will be <S%H5414>given<s%> over [to the horn] <S%H5921>along<s%> with the <S%H8548>regular<s%> <S%H8548>sacrifice;<s%> and it will <S%H7993>fling<s%> <S%H571>truth<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> and <S%H6213>perform<s%> [its will] and <S%H6743>prosper.<s%>

Then I <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H6918>one<s%> <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H6918>one<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to that <S%H6423>particular<s%> <S%H6423>one<s%> who was <S%H1696>speaking,<s%> <S%H4970>"How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> will the <S%H2377>vision<s%> [about] the <S%H8548>regular<s%> <S%H8548>sacrifice<s%> apply, while the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> <S%H8074>causes<s%> <S%H8074>horror,<s%> so as to <S%H5414>allow<s%> both the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place and the <S%H6635>host<s%> to be <S%H4823>trampled<s%>?"
And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "For 2300 <S%H6153>evenings<s%> [and] <S%H1242>mornings;<s%> then the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place will be <S%H6663>properly<s%> <S%H6663>restored.<s%>"

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when I, <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> had <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H2377>vision,<s%> that I <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H998>understand<s%> it; and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me was one <S%H4758>who<s%> <S%H4758>looked<s%> like a <S%H1397>man.<s%>

And I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> [the banks of] <S%H195>Ulai,<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> out and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1403>"Gabriel,<s%> <S%H995>give<s%> <S%H1975>this<s%> [man] an <S%H995>understanding<s%> of the <S%H4758>vision.<s%>"

So he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H681>near<s%> to <S%H5977>where<s%> I was <S%H5977>standing,<s%> and when he <S%H935>came<s%> I was <S%H1204>frightened<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face;<s%> but he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H995>understand<s%> that the <S%H2377>vision<s%> pertains to the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end.<s%>"

Now while he was <S%H1696>talking<s%> with me, I <S%H7290>sank<s%> into a <S%H7290>deep<s%> <S%H7290>sleep<s%> with my <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground;<s%> but he <S%H5060>touched<s%> me and made me <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5921>upright.<s%> <S%H5977><s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am going to let you <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> will <S%H1961>occur<s%> at the <S%H319>final<s%> <S%H319>period<s%> of the <S%H2195>indignation,<s%> for [it] pertains to the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time<s%> of the <S%H7093>end.<s%>
"The <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H7200>saw<s%> with the two <S%H7161>horns<s%> represents the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4074>Media<s%> and <S%H6539>Persia.<s%>

"And the <S%H9617>shaggy<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> [represents] the <S%H4428>kingdom<s%> of <S%H3120>Greece,<s%> and the <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H7161>horn<s%> that is <S%H996>between<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> is the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H4428>king.<s%>

"And the <S%H7665>broken<s%> [horn] and the <S%H702>four<s%> [horns that] <S%H5975>arose<s%> in its <S%H8478>place<s%> [represent] <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4438>kingdoms<s%> [which] will <S%H5975>arise<s%> from [his] <S%H1471>nation,<s%> although not with his <S%H3581>power.<s%>

"And in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H319>period<s%> of their <S%H4438>rule,<s%> When the <S%H6586>transgressors<s%> have <S%H8552>run<s%> [their course,] A <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H5975>arise<s%> <S%H5794>Insolent<s%> <S%H6440><s%> and <S%H995>skilled<s%> in <S%H2420>intrigue.<s%>

"And his <S%H3581>power<s%> will be <S%H6105>mighty,<s%> but not by his [own] <S%H3581>power,<s%> And he will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> to an <S%H6381>extraordinary<s%> <S%H6381>degree<s%> And <S%H6743>prosper<s%> and <S%H6213>perform<s%> [his will;] He will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H6099>men<s%> and the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people.<s%>

"And <S%H5921>through<s%> his <S%H7922>shrewdness<s%> He will cause <S%H4820>deceit<s%> to <S%H6743>succeed<s%> by his <S%H3027>influence;<s%> And he will <S%H1431>magnify<s%> [himself] in his <S%H3824>heart,<s%> And he will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> while [they are] at <S%H7962>ease.<s%> He will even <S%H5975>oppose<s%> the <S%H8269>Prince<s%> of <S%H8269>princes,<s%> But he will be <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H657>without<s%> <S%H3027>human<s%> <S%H3027>agency.<s%>

"And the <S%H4758>vision<s%> of the <S%H6153>evenings<s%> and <S%H1242>mornings<s%> <S%H834>Which<s%> has been <S%H559>told<s%> is <S%H571>true;<s%> But <S%H5640>keep<s%> the <S%H2377>vision<s%> <S%H5640>secret,<s%> For [it] pertains to <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> [in the future.]"

Then I, <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> was <S%H1961>exhausted<s%> and <S%H2470>sick<s%> for <S%H3117>days.<s%> Then I <S%H6965>got<s%> up [again] and <S%H6213>carried<s%> on the king's <S%H4399>business;<s%> but I was <S%H8074>astounded<s%> at the <S%H4758>vision,<s%> and <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H995>explain<s%> [it.]
